summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TON City Builder after syntax fix. Backend APIs 100% working (13/13 tests passed). Frontend landing page and Income Calculator working correctly with Russian language support.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/health returns healthy status with websocket:true ✅
Backend: /api/stats returns valid game statistics (10000 total plots, 3 players) ✅
Backend: /api/plots returns plots list ✅
Backend: /api/plots/coords/50/50 returns center plot with 100.0 TON price ✅
Backend: /api/plots/coords/0/0 returns edge plot with 10.0 TON price ✅
Backend: /api/businesses/types returns 22 business types ✅
Backend: Business types have all required fields (name, icon, cost, income_by_level) ✅
Backend: Multilingual support working (Russian names) ✅
Backend: /api/auth/verify-wallet creates user and returns token ✅
Backend: /api/auth/me returns user info with valid token ✅
Backend: /api/leaderboard returns leaderboard data ✅
Backend: /api/stats/income-table returns income calculations ✅
Backend: /api/businesses returns businesses list ✅
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly without errors ✅
Frontend: TON City title and branding displayed ✅
Frontend: Connect Wallet button visible ✅
Frontend: Stats section shows Players, Plots, Businesses, TON in Circulation ✅
Frontend: Income Calculator button works ✅
Frontend: Language selector works (English/Russian/Chinese) ✅
Frontend: Russian translation fully working ✅
Frontend: Business Types preview section displayed ✅
Frontend: Income Calculator page loads at /income-table ✅
Frontend: Business type selector working ✅
Frontend: Zone selector working with zone restrictions ✅
Frontend: Connections selector working ✅
Frontend: Income by Level table displays correctly ✅
Frontend: Tax Rate, Commissions, Connection Bonus info cards displayed ✅
Frontend: No console errors on pages ✅
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix for wallet verification tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend syntax error was fixed in server.py. All APIs working correctly. Frontend landing page and Income Calculator fully functional with multilingual support (EN/RU/ZH). TON wallet connection requires actual TON wallet browser extension - cannot be tested without real wallet. 22 business types available with zone restrictions working correctly.
